trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for value providers whose values come from a name/value collection.
trans-unit.target: 表示其值的来源的名称/值集合的值提供程序的基类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.NameValueCollectionValueProvider"></xref> class by using a collection and culture information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.NameValueCollectionValueProvider"></xref>通过使用集合和区域性信息的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.NameValueCollectionValueProvider"></xref> class by using a collection, an unvalidated version of the collection, and culture information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.NameValueCollectionValueProvider"></xref>通过使用集合、 集合和区域性信息的未经过验证的版本的类。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the value provider contains the specified prefix.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示值提供程序是否包含指定的前缀。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value provider contains the specified prefix; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果值提供程序包含指定的前缀;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value for the specified key.
Calling this method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.NameValueCollectionValueProvider.GetValue%2A> method overload and passing `false` for the `skipValidation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法等效于调用<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.NameValueCollectionValueProvider.GetValue%2A>方法重载并传入`false`为`skipValidation`参数。</xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.NameValueCollectionValueProvider.GetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value for the specified key.
Returns the value for the specified key and optionally enables the caller to specify whether request validation should be skipped.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定键的值和 （可选） 允许调用方指定是否应跳过请求验证。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to skip validation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要跳过验证，则为否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value for the specified key.
